casebody.data:
No. 10-7221. Luis Burgos-Santos, Petitioner v. Thomas LaValley, Superintendent, Great Meadow Correctional Facility. 562 U.S. 1148, 131 S. Ct. 926,

178 L. Ed. 2d 771,

2011 U.S. LEXIS 488. January 10, 2011.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Second Circuit denied.
